TopicTitle: FanWork Fridays: A Very Explosive Tattoo

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_mzxm1jek9m1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/25393c0a420ab2ef88345d2c23ec2c36/tumblr_inline_mzxmz321Jm1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>We took a poll around the office and this tattoo, sent in by Gene is the first <em><strong>KSP</strong></em>-inspired tattoo we’ve seen. Great choice, Gene. Does anyone else have a <strong>KSP</strong> tattoo? We’d love to see it. You might see it here on <strong>FanWork Fridays</strong>.</p>

Half-life, KSP, StarCraft and Mass Effect.

You, sir, are awesome.
*claps* Well done, now shove your arm into someone's face, and see if they get the message.

You go 'em all correct, well done Tim, and thanks.

I live in New York, no one will get it. Lol. But when my arm is down it looks like an upside-down cross. #kspissatanism

But when my arm is down it looks like an upside-down cross. #kspissatanism

Well when some starts flipping out about it just say "That's the way Peter went out."

You go 'em all correct, well done Tim, and thanks.

I live in New York, no one will get it. Lol. But when my arm is down it looks like an upside-down cross. #kspissatanism

Dont they play ksp in NY?

Dont they play ksp in NY?

It seems very niche in NYC, everyone I've ever asked, not one has even heard of the game. It boggles the mind. #sad

I'm sure people play it here, lol, but I sure haven't found them XD

While I myself am in Brooklyn, I too note that there are few people in my circles who have even heard of it. (I have a lot of RL friends on Steam, however, and some recognize the name from the occasional promotions, so there's that.)

The only reason my friends know about it is that I push it in their face all the time telling them it's THE AWESOME! lol

Edited January 27, 2014 by Runescope

The only reason my friends know about it is that I push it in their face all the time telling them it's THE AWESOME! lol

Yeah, I push it in my friend's faces too, but they just make a rocket and murder kerbals.
He's got all of my favorite games tattooed on his arm. Anyone notice they are all space related?

He's got all of my favorite games tattooed on his arm. Anyone notice they are all space related?

Sci-fi is my favorite. Space specifically. I really enjoy space almost anything. Granted, HL isn't really based in space much... But I still have plenty of room for more tats... I definitely need a Fallout tat somewhere in there.
You go 'em all correct, well done Tim, and thanks.
